description: The `v-snackbar-queue` component is used to display a sequence of messages to the user.

props.closable: Adds a dismiss button that closes the active snackbar.
props.displayStrategy: Determines how new snackbars are handled when the queue is full. **hold** (default) keeps new messages queued until a slot opens. **overflow** dismisses the oldest snackbar to make room for the new one.
props.closeText: The text used in the close button when using the **closable** prop.
props.gap: Sets the gap between stacked snackbars. Requires value in pixels.

exposed.clear: Dismisses all visible snackbars and clears the queue.
